translation.en: Once upon a time, fairy tales were awesome.
translation.es: Había una vez cuentos de hadas que eran geniales.

translation.en: We know, you don't believe us. You think fairy tales are cute and pink and full of fairies.
translation.es: Sabemos que no nos crees. Piensas que los cuentos son color de rosa.

translation.en: - - Well, they're not.
- Real fairy tales are scary. -
Follow two children as they venture off into a dark tale. - A scary tale. -
translation.es: Sigue la aventura de dos niños en una historia oscura, aterradora

translation.en: - A strange tale. -
- - A… Wait a minute. Are you even old enough for this?
- - You really think you can handle it?
You've been warned.
Don't blame me if you can't sleep tonight.
translation.es: No me culpes luego si no duermes.

translation.en: All right then, you're weird. You might as well settle in.
translation.es: Está bien. Qué raro eres. Ponte cómodo, entonces.

translation.en: It's time for A Tale Dark and Grimm.
translation.es: Es hora de los Cuentos lúgubres del reino de Grimm.

translation.en: I don't know. So far the story is not that awesome.
translation.es: Por ahora, la historia no está muy buena.

translation.en: Come on, he hasn't even started yet. Let's dive right in, shall we?
Once upon a time, in the kingdom of Grimm, there were two children…
translation.es: Había una vez dos niños que vivían en el reino de Grimm.

translation.en: Hansel…
Come out, come out, wherever you are.
translation.es: Sal de donde sea que estés.

translation.en: Gotcha!
…and Gretel.
You probably think you know their story.
I don't think you do. Not the real story.
- Never heard of them. - They lived with their mother, the Queen…
translation.es: No me suenan. Vivían con su madre, la reina.

translation.en: Story time.
…and their father, the King.
I'm the dragon!
Their parents loved them very much.
They were a happy, little family.
Until the dragon came.
I'll protect you.
Don't worry, it's only a story.
♪ When the darkness opens wide ♪
♪ Swallowing up the sun inside ♪
- - ♪ Dabbled stars, they prick the sky ♪
♪ Blanket on which the moon will lie ♪
translation.es: y la luna se posa en él ahora.

translation.en: Which is why it was fairly surprising…
…when their father cut off their heads.
translation.es: cuando su padre les cortó la cabeza.

translation.en: Whoa, whoa! You can't tell that part of the story, William.
There are kids out there.
I mean, look at that one over there. How old could you be? Seven?
translation.es: Mira ese de ahí. ¿Cuántos años tienes? ¿Siete?

translation.en: How else is he gonna learn what's inside a person's neck?
translation.es: ¿Cómo va a saber qué hay dentro de un cuello?

translation.en: It's mostly blood.
We're gonna show it. Tastefully!
- What? Too soon? -
You might think that this was the end of the tale of Hansel and Gretel.
translation.es: Pensarías que este fue el fin de Hansel y Gretel.

translation.en: - In fact, it was just the beginning. - Is this really going to work?
translation.es: De hecho, fue solo el comienzo. ¿Seguro funcionará?

translation.en: It will. It has to!
- And… done. -
So, up and at 'em.
- Oh. - Here you go.
- Oh… - Gretel? Hansel? Please!
Oh, how could we ever have believed this would bring them back?
translation.es: ¿Cómo pudimos creer que esto los reviviría?

translation.en: What have we done?
- What? -
Children, you're… awake!
So, who wants chocolate cake?
- I guess a slice would be-- -
No, thank you, Father.
- But Gretel… -
We're very tired, and also we don't remember what happened just now,
translation.es: - Gretel… - Estamos cansados. Y no recordamos qué pasó, por si se lo preguntan.

translation.en: in case you were wondering.
translation.es: Y no recordamos qué pasó, por si se lo preguntan.

translation.en: - I think we'll just go to bed. - I'm not tired.
- Good night. Love you guys. Sleep well. -
translation.es: - No estoy cansado. - Que descansen. Los amamos.

translation.en: - It worked. It really worked. - Do you think they noticed anything?
- Hurry, Hansel. - We have to get out of here.
translation.es: Apúrate, Hansel. Hay que salir de aquí.

translation.en: - - Why would they do that? Don't they love us anymore?
translation.es: ¿Por qué lo hicieron? ¿Ya no nos aman?

translation.en: You don't cut off the heads of things you love.
translation.es: - No le cortas la cabeza a lo que amas. - A las flores sí.

translation.en: You do with flowers. We must have done something bad.
translation.es: - No le cortas la cabeza a lo que amas. - A las flores sí. Seguro hicimos algo malo.

translation.en: - - Something really bad.
This isn't because of us. It's them. They're awful, evil!
translation.es: No es nuestra culpa. Son ellos. Son horribles. ¡Malvados!

translation.en: Parents shouldn't slay their children. Not even once.
translation.es: Los padres no deben matar a sus hijos ni una vez.

translation.en: I-- I shouldn't even have to say that.
Hansel, we have to get out of here.
translation.es: Hansel, hay que salir de aquí.

translation.en: But where are we gonna go?
I don't know, but we'll figure it out, together.
translation.es: No lo sé, pero lo averiguaremos juntos.

translation.en: Will it be an adventure?
- - That I can promise.
And don't worry, I will always protect my little brother.
translation.es: Y descuida, siempre protegeré a mi hermanito.

translation.en: No.
- I'll protect you. -
And I'm not your little brother. You're only two minutes older than me.
translation.es: Y no soy tu hermanito. Solo eres dos minutos mayor.

translation.en: Almost three.
Do you trust me?
Let's do it.
- Adventure! -
- Oh, no. - They're coming. Come! Quick!
Rug! Now!
- Ah! - What did you tie the other end to?
This… is going to be fine.
Who's that weirdo? Why is he wearing a cloak?
translation.es: ¿Quién es ese tipo? ¿Por qué lleva una capa?

translation.en: This is supposed to be… - …mysterious. -
translation.es: Se supone que esto es misterioso.

translation.en: Scared and confused, Hansel and Gretel made their way through the quiet village.
translation.es: Confundidos, Hansel y Gretel atravesaron la tranquila aldea.

translation.en: Gretel, what are we gonna do?
Trust me. I have a plan.
translation.es: Confía en mí. Tengo un plan.

translation.en: We are going to find better parents, perfect parents.
Like ones who won't kill us so much?
Exactly.
Okay, you know that woman who delivers bread to the castle? The one who always gives us chocolate cake?
translation.es: ¿Recuerdas la mujer que va al castillo y nos da pastel de chocolate?

translation.en: Mrs. Baker?
I was thinking she'd make a perfect new mother.
Yeah. Chocolate cake is like love.
translation.es: Sí. El chocolate es como el amor.

translation.en: Mom and Dad used to give us chocolate cake.
translation.es: Mamá y papá nos daban chocolate. ¿Crees que nos amaban?

translation.en: - Do you think they still loved us then? - I don't know, Hansel.  Now, look…
translation.es: Mamá y papá nos daban chocolate. ¿Crees que nos amaban? No sé, Hansel. Mira…

translation.en: Mrs. Baker lives right here.
Uh, what's this we have to go through?
It says, deep dark woods.
Maybe we should go back home.
If we just knew why Mom and Dad did what they did, maybe--
translation.es: Si supiéramos por qué hicieron eso…

translation.en: Hansel, do you really want to get your head cut off again?
translation.es: ¿Quieres que te corten la cabeza otra vez?

translation.en: Just do what I do. Take all your feelings and put them in a box.
translation.es: Pon, como yo, tus sentimientos en una caja,

translation.en: - Lock and bury it and set fire to it. - What?
- Okay. - Never think about them again.
translation.es: Y no pienses más en ellos.

translation.en: How can I set fire to the box after I buried it?
Hansel! We are going to find the perfect parents whatever it takes.
translation.es: Hansel, hallaremos padres perfectos cueste lo que cueste.

translation.en: And then…
Mom and Dad will be sorry.
Let's go. Stay close.
And so Hansel and Gretel made their way
translation.es: Y así Hansel y Gretel se abrieron paso

translation.en: through the deep dark woods
- to find the perfect family. -
translation.es: para encontrar a la familia perfecta.

translation.en: One of us.
Who's there?
I'm armed!
- Ah! - One of us.
D- did you hear that?
It's-- It's just the wind.
Wait!
They're in my hair! Get them off me!
Shoo! Get out of here.
Gross. One of them kissed me!
Okay, we have to find somewhere we can rest for the night.
It's too dark to go on.
- - Look. It's glowing.
This is crazy!
Sewing someone's head back on should not bring them back to life.
translation.es: Coser la cabeza de alguien no debería revivirlo.

translation.en: It's some kind of magic thread.
translation.es: Es una especie de hilo mágico.

translation.en: Modern medicine is amazing.
Gretel, I have a bad feeling about this place.
Just a thought, instead of resting, we could keep walking forever and ever
translation.es: Solo digo, en lugar de descansar, sigamos caminando

translation.en: and please, please not stop in the deep dark woods.
translation.es: sin parar en el bosque lúgubre.

translation.en: - No. We need rest. -
And Hansel, I know you can keep me safe.
translation.es: Y, Hansel, sé que puedes protegerme.

translation.en: - Okay, I can do this. -
Yeah. All I've gotta do is keep my eyes wide open…
translation.es: Sí. Solo tengo que mantener los ojos bien abiertos

translation.en: …all night long.
One of us.
Wolves.
Gretel? Gretel?
Would you rather die awake or in your sleep? Why would you ask?
translation.es: - ¿Prefieres morir despierta o dormida? - ¿Por qué preguntas?

translation.en: In my sleep.
Too late!
- Stay back! Stay back! -
Take this!
I'm sorry I got us into this!
If I have to die again, I'm glad it's with you.
translation.es: Si muero de nuevo, que sea contigo.

translation.en: Wait, did that sound like I'm glad you're dying?
translation.es: ¿Sonó a que me alegra que mueras?

translation.en: I wasn't paying attention!
Stay away! I'm warning you!
- Run! -
That way!
We gotta get across.
I can't do it! I can't do it!
- You have to. Take my hand! -
- Come on! -
- - Help me!
- - Oh no.
- Oh, no, no, no, no, no, no. - Ah!
Bad day to be a wolf.
- Wow! - You two all right?
Those wolves will take a piece of you if you give 'em half a chance.
translation.es: Esos lobos te arrancarán un pedazo si les das chance.

translation.en: Here. You must be freezin'.
- Thank you. - Thanks.
Sir? We're looking for a Mrs. Baker.
translation.es: Señor, buscamos a la señora Baker.

translation.en: Oh, yeah. Yeah, her cottage is a day's walk that way.
translation.es: Ah, sí. Su cabaña está a un día de camino hacia allá.

translation.en: You can't miss it.
Uh, are you two kids alone?
I'm only asking 'cause you look like you need a place to stay.
translation.es: Solo pregunto porque parece que necesitan dónde quedarse.

translation.en: We've got plenty of room on the farm for the both of you
translation.es: Hay mucho espacio en mi granja para los dos

translation.en: and plenty of turnips.
Hansel, a turnip farmer.
Or a cake baker.
We have a winner.
- No, thank you, sir. - But we appreciate your help.
Oh, that's too bad.
We'll be there, if you change your minds.
translation.es: Allá estaremos si cambian de opinión.

translation.en: Thanks. Bye.
See ya.
Hansel and Gretel continued on
unaware that they were being followed by
- him. -
A day later, Hansel and Gretel emerged from the forest
translation.es: Al otro día, Hansel y Gretel salieron del bosque

translation.en: exhausted and hungrier than they had ever been in their lives.
translation.es: exhaustos y más hambrientos que nunca.

translation.en: You want some turnip sack? The sweaty part is salty and good.
translation.es: ¿Quieres saco de nabos? La parte sudada es salada y rica.

translation.en: Hansel, are you seeing what I'm seeing?
translation.es: Hansel, ¿ves lo mismo que yo veo?

translation.en: - - Is that… a cake- house?
I'm going to find out.
With my mouth!
Children!
- Oh, I just love… -
- …children! -
- - Try the fence, my widdle sugar- puffs.
translation.es: Prueben la cerca, mis panecillos de azúcar.

translation.en: - It's peppermint candy cane! -
Thank you, ma'am. I'm sorry we screamed.
translation.es: - Gracias, señora. Lamento los gritos. - Creímos que nos cortarías.

translation.en: - We thought you were gonna chop us up. - Hansel!
translation.es: - Gracias, señora. Lamento los gritos. - Creímos que nos cortarías. - ¡Hansel! - ¿Cortarlos? ¿Por qué?

translation.en: Chop you up? Why?
I love children.
- They're so… sweet. -
Oh, give me a break.
I know we're doing a Is she nice or is she evil? thing,
translation.es: Sé que jugamos con eso de ¿Es buena o es mala?,

translation.en: but come on!
Everyone knows this story. She's a witch who eats children.
translation.es: Todos conocen la historia. Es una bruja que come niños.

translation.en: What's wrong with that? Children are so sweet and juicy.
translation.es: ¿Qué tiene de malo? Los niños son muy dulces y jugosos.

translation.en: She's not a witch. She is a perfectly ordinary woman
translation.es: No es una bruja. Es una mujer común y corriente

translation.en: who eats children.
You see, once she had a child of her own.
And she did what parents so often do…
translation.es: E hizo lo que a menudo hacen los padres.

translation.en: Oh…  …look at you, you are so sweet.
But she took it just a little bit farther.
translation.es: Pero lo llevó un poco más lejos.

translation.en: I could just eat you right up, yes, I could.
- Ooh, oh, I could… just eat you up. -
Thus, her beloved child became several rather delicious pies.
translation.es: Y su amado hijo se convirtió en varios pasteles deliciosos.

translation.en: And once you've developed a taste for children…
translation.es: Y cuando le tomas gusto a los niños…

translation.en: …it's a hard habit to give up.
Come in, sweet ones. Come, come, come.
Stay for dinner. - Stay as long as you like. -
translation.es: Quédense a cenar. Quédense el tiempo que quieran.

translation.en: Stay forever.
Sit.
Let me bring you a little snack. You must be hungry.
translation.es: Traeré un bocadillo. Deben tener hambre.

translation.en: What brings you to my little cottage, my sweethearts? Our parents chopped our heads off.
translation.es: - ¿Qué los trae por aquí? - Nuestros papás nos cortaron la cabeza.

translation.en: - - Really? How inconsiderate. Ha!
We're looking for the perfect family. Or at least one that won't kill us.
translation.es: Buscamos a la familia perfecta. O una que no nos mate.

translation.en: And will let us eat chocolate cake whenever we want.
translation.es: Y que nos dé pastel de chocolate cuando queramos.

translation.en: And never make us do chores.
Well, I have some…  …cake for you now!
translation.es: Bueno, aquí hay pastel para ustedes.

translation.en: And just about everything you could ever desire.
translation.es: Y todo lo que puedan desear.

translation.en: How's that for a happily ever after?
Ma'am, may we eat like animals?
You do you, baby.
Hansel and Gretel had found something to replace their parents' love:
translation.es: Hansel y Gretel encontraron el remplazo del amor de sus padres:

translation.en: food.
- - Really just a lot of food.
- Eat up. - Mmm.
This. That. Some of this. Some of that. Eat my sweets.
translation.es: Esto. Eso. Algo de esto, algo de eso. Coman.

translation.en: - - This is very good cake.
Mmm. Yeah.
She must really love us, right?
Yeah.
Remember when Mom and Dad played hide- and- seek with us?
translation.es: ¿Recuerdas jugar a las escondidas con mamá y papá?

translation.en: Do you think they still loved us then?
I don't know, Hansel.
We have Mrs. Baker now. Everything is fine.
translation.es: Tenemos a la señora Baker. Todo está bien.

translation.en: Here you go, my sugar plums.
Eat those pies up…
♪ And get nice and plump and juicy ♪
♪ Chubby, chubby kids ♪
Oh, look at my sweepy widdle muffins.
Come, I have a lovely room ready for you with great, soft beds.
translation.es: Tengo una hermosa habitación para ustedes con camas grandes y suaves.

translation.en: Good night, sleep tight. Don't let the bed bugs bite.
translation.es: Buenas noches, duerman lindo. Que no los muerda un bicho.

translation.en: Not until you're…
ripe.
We did it, Hansel. - - We found the perfect family.
translation.es: Lo logramos, Hansel. Encontramos a la familia perfecta.

translation.en: And she's so pretty.
I love her so much.
How come is the closet full of children's shoes?
translation.es: ¿Por qué el armario está lleno de zapatos de niños?

translation.en: Eh… Kids are always losing things. That one has a foot in it.
translation.es: - A los niños se les pierde todo. - Ese tiene un pie adentro.

translation.en: - A little foot leg. -
Don't worry about it.  It's fine.
translation.es: No te preocupes, no pasa nada.

translation.en: My plan worked perfect and everything's fine.
translation.es: Mi plan funcionó perfectamente y todo está bien.

translation.en: If you say so.
Good night.
Wakey wakey.
- Foody- oot. Food, food. -
- Yay! - Food!
- - Mmm. Yes. Eat up, little piggies, eat up!
Those ham hocks ain't gonna fatten themselves.
Digesting so much food took a lot of energy.
translation.es: Digerir tanta comida requería mucha energía.

translation.en: After a while this left very little energy for Hansel and Gretel's brains.
translation.es: Y, al tiempo, sus cerebros se quedaron sin ella.

translation.en: That was when Mrs. Baker decided… - - …they were ripe.
translation.es: Fue ahí cuando la señora Baker decidió que estaban listos.

translation.en: Oh, Hansel.
Is that you, food?
I need your help in the kitchen, honey pie.
- Okay. -
- There's food there, right? - Uh- huh. Yeah.
Be a lamb and get in the oven
and tell me when it's hot enough to bake you and your sister, will you?
translation.es: y dime cuándo esté caliente para hornearlos a ti y a tu hermana.

translation.en: - - There's a widdle boofy- woops.
How will I know when it's hot enough?
You'll die.
- Hey. - Yes?
If I'm dead, how will I tell you it's hot enough?
translation.es: Si muero, ¿cómo diré que está caliente?

translation.en: I'll smell you cooking.
M'kay.
- Whew, boy, whew. -
Wow. Something smells delicious.
It's me that smells delicious.
translation.es: Soy yo el que huele delicioso.

translation.en: Oh, it's just you, pocket pork chop.
Wait a second.
Dying is bad!
No! Hot, hot, hot, hot!
How are you doing in there, my widdle dumpwing?
Uh-- Uh, just fine. Nearly dead now.
I don't smell you yet!
Hansel hardly had any brainpower left.
translation.es: Hansel casi no podía pensar, pero pudo pensar lo suficiente

translation.en: But he had just enough to trick Mrs. Baker
translation.es: Hansel casi no podía pensar, pero pudo pensar lo suficiente para hacer que la señora Baker abriera el horno.

translation.en: into opening the oven door.
translation.es: para hacer que la señora Baker abriera el horno.

translation.en: There it is.
My dear little piggie.
- Heads up! Ha! Get baked! -
No! No!
- - You ungrateful little swine!
- Gretel, wake up! We have to go! -
Food?
- She tried to cook me! We have to go! - Wait. What's going on?
Oven… doors… don't… lock!
translation.es: ¡Las puertas de los hornos no se cierran!

translation.en: Sweeties!
Hansel?
Hansel!
Do you really want to know when your parents stopped loving you?
translation.es: ¿En serio quieren saber cuándo sus padres dejaron de amarlos?

translation.en: The answer is quite simple.
Obvious, really.
They never loved you. Never. Never. Never.
You know it's true.
Eat this!
- - Um, maybe she's okay?
- Uh… - Maybe she's okay.
Oh, she is not okay.
Mmm. Candy canes never looked so good.
Would you please just…
Forget it.
Can we just check in on the children who are watching this right now?
translation.es: ¿Podemos darle un vistazo a los niños que ven esto?

translation.en: Are you guys all okay out there?
How about that little kid? You.
You're still here?
A woman just got impaled on a peppermint stick.
translation.es: A una mujer la atravesó un bastón de menta.

translation.en: Why would he not leave? I give up.
translation.es: ¿Por qué no se va? Me rindo.

translation.en: I like that kid.
And so Hansel and Gretel got far away from that place as quickly as they could.
translation.es: Y Hansel y Gretel se alejaron de ese lugar tan rápido como pudieron.

translation.en: It's true, isn't it? Mom and Dad never loved us.
translation.es: Es verdad, ¿no? Mamá y papá nunca nos amaron.

translation.en: But that means we did the right thing. We just didn't pick the right parent.
translation.es: Entonces hicimos lo correcto. No elegimos al padre correcto.

translation.en: That's the reason my plan didn't work.
translation.es: Por eso mi plan no funcionó.

translation.en: - - We need someone more down to earth.
translation.es: Necesitamos a alguien con los pies en la tierra.

translation.en: Like that farmer!
Nothing's more down to earth than turnips.
translation.es: Nada es más aterrizado que los nabos.

translation.en: We can do this. We can find a better family.
A perfect family. Are you with me?
We're never going back. It's you and me forever.
translation.es: Nunca retrocederemos. Somos tú y yo para siempre.

translation.en: - - Hello.
We meet again.
Unfortunately.
Two children were here, two unusual children.
translation.es: Dos niños estuvieron aquí, dos niños inusuales.

translation.en: They are mine.
Oh, you can have them, for now.
That's not what I'm here for.
translation.es: No es por eso que vine.

translation.en: Oh, yes, you should carry on.
Ta- ta.
Have a fantabulous trip.
Um, hello? H-- Hello?
So, wait. - What's going on here? -
Nothing good.
Me? Wait, no. But I'm-- But I'm not ripe yet.
translation.es: ¿Yo? Espera, no. Aún no estoy lista.

translation.en: No. But you are done.
Nailed it.
Under a sunny sky, Hansel and Gretel arrived at the turnip farm.
translation.es: Bajo un cielo soleado, llegaron a la granja de nabos.

translation.en: That farmer seemed like a no- nonsense guy.
I'm sure he'll be completely normal.
Not weird at all.
Hello, children.
This is fine.
♪ When the darkness opens wide ♪
♪ Swallowing up the sun inside ♪
♪ Dappled stars, they prick the sky ♪
♪ Blanket on which the moon will lie ♪
translation.es: y la luna se posa en él ahora.

translation.en: ♪ Why must daylight always dim? ♪
translation.es: ¿Por qué se apaga siempre la luz del día?

translation.en: ♪ Creeping dusk, so cold and grim ♪
translation.es: Se acerca la noche lúgubre y fría.

translation.en: ♪ 'Tis the blackness of the night ♪
- ♪ Teaches us how to see the light ♪ -
translation.es: nos enseña a ver con claridad.
